assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Nissha Co., Ltd. engages in industrial materials, devices, medical technologies, information and communication, and pharmaceutical and cosmetics businesses in Japan and internationally. The company offers decorative film-molded parts, such as in-mold decoration technology and electronics, transfer foil, molding, CMF design sample book products; and sustainable materials, including metallized paper and board, and molded products. It also provides film devices comprising medical electrodes, diagnostic sensors, heaters, and antennas; and touch, force, and gas sensors. In addition, the company designs and manufactures medical technologies; develops and manufactures pharmaceuticals and quasi-drugs; and manufactures and distributes patient monitoring and medical surgical consumables. Further, it offers publication and commercial printing, high-definition digital archive photography, and fabric printing products and services; contract development and manufacturing film type of pharmaceuticals, such as oral thin films and transdermal patches; and dissolving microneedle patches. The company serves mobility, mobile device, home appliance, medical, food and consumer goods, cosmetics, and industrial equipment markets. Nissha Co., Ltd. was formerly known as Nissha Printing Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nissha Co., Ltd. in 2017. The company was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.
